subject: Baseball
Left-Handedness
lead_paragraph: Mayberry does well enough against left-handed pitching that the Mets will often use him in place of Lucas Duda or Curtis Granderson, their two lefties who struggle against left-handers.
snippet: Mayberry does well enough against left-handed pitching that the Mets will often use him in place of Lucas Duda or Curtis Granderson, their two lefties who struggle against left-handers.
